name: Loving Blindly
description:
Can you find your way as you love blindly?

  • Controlls
    • LoveMan 
      • Arrow => Move right and left
      • Space => Jump
    • BrainMan
      • Mouse => Move through the level
      • Click => Spawn one platform to help love out

--------

Made for :

The 2019 Brackeys Game Jam #2
from 02/16/2019 to 02/23/2019

Made by :

Concept and GameDesign:
Leinox, Captain Nakou and the help of the A-Team

Development & Arts:
Captain Nakou

Level Design :
Leinox

Free Music by :
Hyde - Free Instrumentals 
Acoustic/Folk Instrumental - Mumford & Sons 
https://soundcloud.com/davidhydemusic/acousticfolk-instrumental-mumford-sons-ins...
